contentrichtext.text: {{Distinguish|Icebreaker}} {{Unreferenced|date=July 2008}} [[Image:IcebreakersHockey.png|right]] '''Icebreakers''' is an [[ice hockey]] team founded in 2002 by (among others) [[Peter Forsberg]] and [[Markus NÃ¤slund]]. Their purpose is to raise money for a foundation who give scholarships to handicapped or otherwise needy children. They raise this money not only by playing charity ice hockey games, but also by attending auctions or playing celebrity golf. The team consists of [[Sweden|Swedish]] players in the [[National Hockey League]]. The larger part are players who were at one time or another members of the [[Modo Hockey|Modo]] squad. == External links == * {{sv icon}} [http://www.icebreakers.se/ Official homepage] [[Category:Charities based in Sweden]] [[Category:Children's charities]] [[Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden]] {{Sweden-sport-team-stub}} {{europe-icehockey-team-stub}}
